props.activator: Designate a custom activator when the `activator` slot is not used. String can be any valid querySelector and Object can be any valid Node.
props.attach: Specifies which DOM element that this component should detach to.
props.contentClass: Applies a custom class to content wrapper. Transition origin can be sets on the element with [Tailwindcss](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/transform-origin).
props.eager: Will force the components content to render on mounted.
props.hideOverlay: Hides the display of the overlay.
props.maxWidth: Sets the maximum width for the content.
props.modelValue: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
props.noClickAnimation: Disables the bounce effect when clicking outside of a content when using the **persistent** prop.
props.openOnClick: Designates whether modal should open on activator click.
props.openOnFocus: Designates whether modal should open on activator focus.
props.openOnHover: Designates whether modal should open on activator hover.
props.overlayClass: Applies a custom class to overlay.
props.persistent: Clicking outside of the element will not deactivate it.
props.retainFocus: Tab focus will return to the first child of the dialog by default.
props.scrollable: When set to true, expects a component with a designated height.
props.transition: Sets the component transition. Can be string name of transition or object with [custom transition classes](https://v3.vuejs.org/guide/transitions-enterleave.html#custom-transition-classes).
props.width: Width of the content. Value `auto` setting width of modal eq. to activator width.

emits.update:modelValue: Emitted when the model value updated.
emits.click:outside: Event that fires when clicking outside an active dialog.
emits.keydown: Event that fires when key is pressed. If dialog is active and not using the **persistent** prop, the **esc** key will deactivate it.

slots.activator: When used, will activate the component when clicked (or hover for specific components).
